STATE
v.
WATSON. No. COA08-315. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed December 2, 2008. Certification Date December 22, 2008. Appeal from Johnston (06CRS53635, 06CRS53636, 06CRS54139).

Case reported without published opinion. New trial in case number 06CRS54139. No error as to all other cases..
